translations: 要点，主旨，大意；<法律>诉讼要点

sentences.sentence: He related the gist of his conversation to Sam.
sentences.translation: 他将他谈话的要点告诉了塞姆。

sentences.sentence: I missed the beginning of the lecture—can you give me the gist of what he said?
sentences.translation: 我未听到讲座的开头—给我讲讲他说话的要点好吗？

sentences.sentence: Through hearing stories with a clear beginning, middle, and ending children may learn too extract the gist f events in ways that they will be able to describe many years later.
sentences.translation: 通过聆听有清晰开头、主体和结尾的故事，孩子们可能会学着提取事情的主旨，在多年后能以同样的方式形容出来。
